page.title: 08Shapwick Shop
page.content: {Shapwick}shop's original part is{300 {years old.}Its additional parts are 150 - 200 years old.It used to be a drapers with a tailors sewing room. It became a general store in the 1930s. Accommodation with the shop is a four bedroomed house and a two bedroomed holiday flat.There are well kept gardens at the front with a bench and a{telephone kiosk.}The shop is run by a family with one part time helper.It is now a general store and{post office with an{off licence.}The off licence was introduced in June 1985.There is a G.R. model post box.Sorting and deliveries ceased at the post office in April 1984.The shop now sells bread as there is no bakers delivery any more.
